programme.title: Get Away
programme.desc: A family's holiday to a remote getaway takes a lethal turn when they discover the island they're on is inhabited by a serial killer. Director Steffen Haars' comedy horror, written by and starring Nick Frost, with Aisling Bea and Sebastian Croft Steffan Haars - Director Nick Frost - Richard Smith Aisling Bea - Susan Smith Sebastian Croft - Sam Smith Maisie Ayres - Jessie Smith.

programme.title: Desperation Road
programme.desc: In Mississippi, a mother and her child are caught in a crossfire as alcohol, guns and revenge clash. Thriller based on Michael Farris Smith's namesake novel, starring Garrett Hedlund, Willa Fitzgerald and Mel Gibson Nadine Crocker - Director Garrett Hedlund - Russell Grimes Willa Fitzgerald - Maben Mel Gibson - Mitchell Ryan Hurst - Larry Michael Aaron Milligan - Walt Kat Foster - Dana Shiloh Fernandez - Clint.

programme.title: The Book of Clarence
programme.desc: Biblical comedy starring LaKeith Stanfield. In AD 33 Jerusalem, debt-ridden criminal Clarence, the ne'er-do-well atheist brother of apostle Thomas, decides to make some much-needed cash by posing as a new messiah. But learning the same "tricks" as Jesus Christ proves tougher than initially assumed Jeymes Samuel - Director LaKeith Stanfield - Clarence / Thomas Omar Sy - Barabbas Anna Diop - Varinia R J Cyler - Elijah David Oyelowo - John the Baptist Micheal Ward - Judas Iscariot Alfre Woodard - Virgin Mary Teyana Taylor - Mary Magdalene Caleb McLaughlin - Dirty Zeke Marianne Jean-Baptiste - Amina James McAvoy - Pontius Pilate Benedict Cumberbatch - Benjamin.

programme.title: Night Swim
programme.desc: Forced into early retirement by a degenerative illness, former baseball player Ray Waller moves into a new house with his wife and two children. He hopes that the backyard swimming pool will be fun for the kids and provide physical therapy for himself. However, a dark secret from the home's past soon unleashes a malevolent force that drags the family into the depths of inescapable terror. Writer/director Bryce McGuire's horror, starring Wyatt Russell and Kerry Condon Bryce McGuire - Director Wyatt Russell - Ray Waller Kerry Condon - Eve Waller Amélie Hoeferle - Izzy Waller Gavin Warren - Elliot Waller Nancy Lenehan - Kay.

programme.title: Moving On
programme.desc: Comedy drama starring Jane Fonda and Lily Tomlin. At the funeral for an old friend, Claire approaches the deceased's widower and states that she intends to murder him in revenge for something terrible he did decades ago. Claire then reconnects with her estranged college pal, Evelyn, who agrees to help out - if only to see if Claire really follows through.. Paul Weitz - Director Jane Fonda - Claire Lily Tomlin - Evelyn Malcolm McDowell - Howard Richard Roundtree - Ralph Sarah Burns - Allie Catherine Dent - Molly.

programme.title: Jericho Ridge
programme.desc: Action thriller starring Nikki Amuka-Bird. Injured police deputy Tabby Temple returns to work after a period of leave to discover that the station has been broken into and weaponry stolen. Her colleagues leave her to work dispatch for the night, but with a pair of local criminals still sniffing around the station, Tabby soon finds herself at the centre of a siege that steadily escalates Will Gilbey - Director Nikki Amuka-Bird - Deputy Tabby Temple Zack Morris - Monty Temple Simon Kunz - Sheriff Eddie Reynolds Michael Socha - Earl Macready Philipp Christopher - Carter.

programme.title: Transformers: Rise Of The Beasts
programme.sub-title: Action, Fantasy, War, Drama, Sci Fi ║ 2023 ║ 12A
programme.desc: In 1994 New York City, ex-serviceman Noah Diaz accepts a job from neighbourhood chancer Reek to steal a sports car. The high-end vehicle turns out to be robot-in-disguise Mirage, who propels Noah into the midst of a hunt for a precious Transwarp key. The device will allow Autobot leader Optimus Prime and his mechanised compatriots to return home to Cybertron. Fantasy prequel, starring Anthony Ramos and Dominique Fishback Steven Caple Jr - Director Anthony Ramos - Noah Dominique Fishback - Elena Lauren Velez - Breanna Diaz Peter Cullen - Optimus Prime Ron Perlman - Optimus Primal Peter Dinklage - Scourge Michelle Yeoh - Airazor Pete Davidson - Mirage Colman Domingo - Unicron Michael Kelly (2) - Agent Burke.

programme.title: The Mummy
programme.sub-title: Action, Fantasy, Drama, Horror, Thriller, Sci Fi ║ 1999 ║ 12
programme.desc: Period horror adventure starring Brendan Fraser and Rachel Weisz. A party of archaeologists, led by American adventurer Rick O'Connell, discover a tomb containing the 3,000-year-old remains of a murderous Egyptian priest, Imhotep. When the mummy is accidentally disturbed, he unleashes his terrifying powers on those who have desecrated his resting place Stephen Sommers - Director Brendan Fraser - Rick O'Connell Rachel Weisz - Evelyn John Hannah - Jonathan Arnold Vosloo - Imhotep Kevin J O'Connor - Beni Jonathan Hyde - Egyptologist Oded Fehr - Ardeth Bay Omid Djalili - Warden.

programme.title: The Mummy Returns
programme.sub-title: Action, Fantasy, Drama, Thriller, Horror ║ 2001 ║ PG
programme.desc: Period horror adventure sequel starring Brendan Fraser and Rachel Weisz. When the young son of Rick O'Connell and his Egyptologist wife find an ancient bracelet that holds power over the armies of the fearsome Scorpion King, it attracts the attention of Meela, reincarnated lover of the resurrected high priest Imhotep, who needs the artefact to help him defeat the Scorpion King and become the ultimate ruler Stephen Sommers - Director Brendan Fraser - Rick O'Connell Rachel Weisz - Evelyn / Nefertiri John Hannah - Jonathan Arnold Vosloo - Imhotep Oded Fehr - Ardeth Bay Patricia Velasquez - Meela / Anck-Su-Namun Dwayne Johnson - The Scorpion King Freddie Boath - Alex Alun Armstrong - Mr Hafez Adewale Akinnuoye-Agbaje - Lock-Nah Shaun Parkes - Izzy Buttons Aharon Ipale - Pharaoh Donna Air - Showgirl.

programme.title: The Mummy: Tomb of the Dragon Emperor
programme.desc: Period horror adventure starring Brendan Fraser and Jet Li. programme.title: The Shamrock Spitfire
programme.desc: Co Dublin-born fighter pilot Brendan Finucane, known by his colleagues as Paddy, hones his skills in the RAF during the Second World War, eventually becoming the youngest wing commander in its history. programme.title: Cult Killer
programme.desc: After a private investigator is murdered, his protégé discovers the grisly secrets of their town. programme.title: Arcadian
programme.sub-title: Horror, Thriller, Drama, Sci Fi, Action ║ 2024 ║ 15
programme.desc: Action horror starring Nicolas Cage. Following an apocalyptic event, single father Paul lives with his two teenage sons on an isolated homestead, forced to hide every night from the nocturnal monsters that stalk the outdoors. Though the trio has settled into a relatively stable routine, their lives are threatened when the creatures start working out how to get inside.. programme.title: Black Hawk Down
programme.sub-title: Documentary And Factual, War, Drama, Action, History ║ 2001 ║ 15
programme.desc: War drama based on real events, starring Josh Hartnett, Ewan McGregor and Tom Sizemore. On 3 October 1993, elite US troops were sent into Somalia's capital, Mogadishu, to capture two lieutenants working for the local warlord responsible for orchestrating a famine in the region. The ensuing 15-hour battle saw the deaths of nearly 20 American soldiers, and hundreds of Somalis, after two Black Hawk helicopters were shot down Ridley Scott - Director Josh Hartnett - Ranger Staff Sgt Matt Eversmann Ewan McGregor - Ranger Spec Grimes Tom Sizemore - Ranger Lt Col Danny McKnight Eric Bana - Delta Sgt First Class \Hoot\ Gibson William Fichtner - Delta Sgt First Class Jeff Sanderson Ewen Bremner - Specialist Shawn Nelson Sam Shepard - Maj Gen William F Garrison Gabriel Casseus - Ranger Spec Mike Kurth Kim Coates - Delta Master Sgt Chris \Wex\ Wexler Hugh Dancy - Ranger Sgt First Class Kurt Schmid Ron Eldard - Chief Warrant Officer Mike Durant Ioan Gruffudd - Ranger Beales Jeremy Piven - Chief Warrant Officer Cliff Wolcott Brendan Sexton III - Ranger Private First Class Richard Kowalewski Jason Isaacs - Captain Mike Steele Orlando Bloom - Private First Class Todd Blackburn Zeljko Ivanek - Harrell Glenn Morshower - Matthews Tom Hardy - Twombly Carmine Giovinazzo - Goodale Matthew Marsden - Sizemore Treva Etienne - Firimbi Ty Burrell - Wilkinson.

programme.title: The American Society of Magical Negroes
programme.desc: Satirical fantasy comedy starring Justice Smith and David Alan Grier. Genial artist Aren, who is African-American, is struggling to make sense of his place in the world until he's invited to join a secret society dedicated to enhancing the lives of white people. programme.title: Barber
programme.desc: Detective thriller starring Aidan Gillen. Shortly after the announcement of the Covid-19 pandemic, Dublin private eye Val Barber is tasked with finding a missing young woman. programme.title: No Hard Feelings
programme.desc: Faced with the possibility of losing her mother's house, a woman called Maddie answers an advert from a married couple, who are offering a Buick Regal car to anyone willing to 'date' their introverted 19-year-old son Percy before he attends college. Maddie promises to bring the teenager out of his shell. programme.title: The Cinema List: Black British Actors

programme.desc: Franklin, a blogger, scuppers an attack against tech guru Anton Burrell, and finds a ring that the pioneering genius dropped. programme.title: 8 Mile

programme.title: The Bikeriders
programme.desc: Truck driver Johnny is inspired to establish the Vandals motorcycle club in 1960s Chicago. He assembles a motley crew, including Brucie, Benny, Cal and Zipco. Exuberant outsider Kathy falls under Benny's spell, and they marry, but when the groom is the victim of a violent assault, Johnny exacts revenge, while Kathy fights for her husband's tormented soul. programme.sub-title: Action, Family, Drama, Animation, Comedy, Fantasy, Children's, Sci Fi ║ 2024 ║ PG
programme.desc: Harold and pals Moose and Porcupine live in a hand-drawn world of limitless possibilities. The trio become concerned when the Old Man, who narrates their illustrated existence, suddenly falls silent. programme.title: S/Lge 24 Highlights
programme.desc: St Helens host Leeds Rhinos in the Betfred Super League. The Saints were in rampant mood during round 11's clash with Castleford, pulling off an incredible 4-60 victory. (24.05).

programme.title: WS/Lge 24 Highlights
programme.desc: Action from the Betfred Women's Super League, as St Helens and Leeds Rhinos clash at the Totally Wicked Stadium. After three played, it's Leeds Rhinos who boast the perfect record. (24.05).

programme.title: S/Lge 24 Highlights
programme.desc: St Helens host Catalans Dragons in the Betfred Super League. Saints ran away with a 40-10 win over Leeds Rhinos last week to go top of the table. (31.05).

programme.desc: Natasha Jonas and Lauren Price headline a historic all-women's card at the iconic Royal Albert Hall, as the British pair collide in a world welterweight division unification fight. (07.03).

programme.title: PL: United v Tottenham 92/93
programme.desc: United Archives 9/1/93. After a 5-0 home win in their last league game, the Reds were on a roll when they welcomed Spurs to Old Trafford.

programme.title: PL: Norwich v United 92/93
programme.desc: United Archives 5/4/93. United travelled to Carrow Road for a crunch match against title rivals Norwich.

programme.title: PL: Manchester City v United 93/94
programme.desc: United Archives 7/11/93. This derby clash proved to be the archetypal game of two halves, thankfully it ended in three points for the Reds.

programme.title: FAC: Wimbledon v United 93/94
programme.desc: United Archives 20/2/94. United make light work of Wimbledon in this fifth round FA Cup tie.

programme.title: 1994 FA Cup Final: v Chelsea
programme.desc: United Archives 14/5/94. United were aiming to become the fourth club in the 20th Century to complete The Double & for the first time in the club's history as they took on Chelsea in the FA Cup final.

programme.title: PL: United v Man City 94/95
programme.desc: United Archives 10/11/94. A classic derby encounter as Brian Horton brought his team across the city to Old Trafford.

programme.title: What I Wore: Eric Cantona
programme.desc: United legend Eric Cantona reflects on his iconic career with Andrew Mensah, as the mercurial Frenchman takes a look at some of his favourite classic kits with BT Sport.

programme.title: Blackburn v United 94/95
programme.desc: United Archives 24/10/94. Alex Ferguson and Kenny Dalglish went head-to-head at Ewood Park with both sides looking to lay down a marker as title contenders.

programme.title: 1996 FA Cup Final: v Liverpool
programme.desc: United Archives 11/5/96. United were aiming to become the first club to win the FA Cup 9 times in this final against Liverpool and also win the League and Cup double on two occasions.

programme.title: PL: Newcastle v United 95/96
programme.desc: United Archives 4/3/96. A huge game in the 1995/96 title race as Eric Cantona's winner cut Newcastle's lead over United to just one point with the end of the season looming.

programme.title: PL: United v Sunderland 96/97
programme.desc: United Archives 21/12/96. United took on Sunderland for the first time in the Premier League on what was to be a memorable afternoon at the Theatre of Dreams.

programme.title: PL: Leeds v United 96/97
programme.desc: United Archives 7/9/96. Eric Cantona is in the United line up and returns to his former club as the Reds take on Leeds.

programme.title: La Philosophie de Cantona: The Rebel Speaks

programme.desc: Over 20 years since signing for United, this documentary examines Cantona's personal philosophies. With exclusive contributions from Eric's family.

programme.desc: After Challenge Cup final defeat to Wigan at Wembley, Warrington Wolves return to action as they host a Salford Red Devils side who look to build on a 34-4 win over the Broncos. (14.06).

programme.title: S/Lge 24 Highlights
programme.desc: Castleford Tigers host Hull KR in the Betfred Super League. The Tigers fell agonisingly short to the champions Wigan in round 14, while the Robins put Huddersfield to the sword. (20.06).

programme.title: S/Lge 24 Highlights
programme.desc: Looking to bounce back from unexpected defeat to the Black and Whites, Leeds host Leigh Leopards in the Betfred Super League. Leigh recently produced a rousing display in Perpignan. (21.06).

programme.title: Hagler v Hearns 1985
programme.desc: Re-watch the historic 1985 world middleweight championship boxing match between undisputed champion Marvelous Marvin Hagler and challenger Thomas Hearns.

programme.title: Hagler v Duran 1983
programme.desc: Re-watch a world middleweight title showdown as the formidable defending champion Marvin Hagler defends the gold against Roberto Duran.

programme.title: S/Lge 24 Highlights
programme.desc: Hull KR host Catalans Dragons in the Betfred Super League. Last time out, the Dragons came away from Perpignan with two points having overcome Huddersfield on home soil. (06.07).

programme.title: S/Lge 24 Highlights
programme.desc: Warrington Wolves host Huddersfield Giants in the Betfred Super League. Matt Dufty was the match winner for Warrington previously as his side emerged 24-18 winners at Hull KR. (05.07).

programme.title: S/Lge 24 Highlights
programme.desc: For the third time in 2024, Hull FC and Hull KR clash. The last two derbies belonged to the Robins, who have won four of the last five league matches against the Black and Whites. (13.07).

programme.title: S/Lge 24 Highlights
programme.desc: After their eight-try victory over Huddersfield last time out, Warrington Wolves host a Leeds Rhinos side hunting for their third consecutive Betfred Super League victory. (11.07).

programme.title: Tri Nations Rugby: ARG v SA
programme.desc: In round five of the Rugby Championship, Argentina welcome the world champions to Santiago. Los Pumas stand as the only team capable of denying South Africa the 2024 title. (21.09).

programme.title: Fight Night: Jonas v Price
programme.desc: Natasha Jonas and Lauren Price headline a historic all-women's card at the iconic Royal Albert Hall, as the British pair collide in a world welterweight division unification fight. (07.03).

programme.title: S/Lge 24 Highlights
programme.desc: The Brick Community Stadium's derby day doubleheader concludes with a blockbuster clash between the table-topping champions, Wigan Warriors, and a third-placed Saints outfit. (12.07).

programme.title: S/Lge 24 Highlights
programme.desc: The Brick Community Stadium gets set for a doubleheader with action from the Women's Super League, as Denis Betts' Wigan try to widen the gap at the top with a win over St Helens. (12.07).

programme.title: S/Lge 24 Highlights
programme.desc: In the Betfred Super League, St Helens play host to a Warrington Wolves side riding a three-game winning streak. The Saints fell away from home to league leaders last week. (19.07).
